other_tests.findings: Elevated thyroid hormones and suppressed TSH levels in the absence of thyroid autoantibodies.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the age of 11 5/12 years, the thyroid gland was still not enlarged.

other_tests.findings: Thyroid gland of normal size and structure, with homogeneous echogenicity and without hyperperfusion.
Bone age was 11 6/12 years, not accelerated.

Slight reduction of cell surface expression and TSH induced cAMP accumulation compared to the wild type; constitutive activation of the Gs pathway with nearly complete loss-of-function for Gq/11 pathway.

other_tests.date: When the patient was 15 years old
other_tests.findings: Patient was treated with radioiodine ablation for hyperthyroidism.
